subject: Biathlon
lead_paragraph: Andrea Henkel of Germany won the women’s biathlon 10-kilometer pursuit race in Anterselva, Italy, to close in on Kati Wilhelm, the overall leader and her compatriot. Henkel won by 33.4 seconds over Svetlana Slepstova of Russia.. Wilhelm, who was 10th, leads the standings by 19 points. Bjorn Ferry of Sweden won the men’s event. Ole Einar Bjorndalen of Norway, who placed seventh, retained first place in the overall standings.
